tagline: Build bots or slash commands for this enterprise chat app.
description: Connect to the HipChat Enterprise Messaging API to build bots or slash commands for this enterprise chat app. Test an API call and export the code snippet.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Gets an OAuth token for requested grant type.

args.name: code
args.info: The authorization code to exchange for an access token.

args.name: userId
args.info: The id of the user the token is acting on behalf of.

args.name: clientName
args.info: The name of the public oauth client retrieving a token for.

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: The URL that was used to generate an authorization code, and it must match that value.

args.name: scope
args.info: A space-delimited list of scopes that is requested.

args.name: groupId
args.info: The name of the group to which the related user belongs.

blocks.name: getAddonCapabilitiesSchema
blocks.description: Gets the addon capabilities descriptor schema.

args.name: draft
args.info: The json schema draft version to use. One of: v2, v4.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: emoticonIdOrKey
args.info: The id or shortcut of the emoticon.

blocks.name: getAllEmoticons
blocks.description: Gets all emoticons for the current group.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The start index for the result set.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of results.

args.name: type
args.info: The type of emoticons to get. One of: global, group, all.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this action.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this action.

args.name: targetOptions
args.info: JSON Object containing options which vary based on the type of target.

args.name: targetKey
args.info: The key of a dialog glance or web panel that should be opened in response to this action.

args.name: weight
args.info: Determines the order in which the action appears in menu or list.

args.name: location
args.info: The location of this action. One of: hipchat.message.action, hipchat.input.action.

args.name: conditions
args.info: Array of JSON objects of conditions determine whether this action is shown A mixed array of the following types.

args.name: nameI18n
args.info: The optional localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: nameValue
args.info: The default text.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this action.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this dialog.

args.name: url
args.info: The url where the dialog content is hosted.

args.name: authentication
args.info: The authentication method for this dialog. One of: jwt, none.

args.name: optionsStyle
args.info: The dialog style. One of: normal, warning.

args.name: optionsHintI18n
args.info: The optional localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: optionsHintValue
args.info: The default text.

args.name: optionsFilterPlaceholderI18n
args.info: The optional localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: optionsFilterPlaceholderValue
args.info: The default text.

args.name: optionsPrimaryActionEnabled
args.info: Whether button is disabled or enabled.

args.name: optionsPrimaryActionNameI18n
args.info: The optional localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: optionsPrimaryActionNameValue
args.info: The default text.

args.name: optionsPrimaryActionKey
args.info: A key that can be used to register an event listener.

args.name: optionsSecondaryActions
args.info: Array of JSON objects of secondary actions of the dialog rendered as link buttons.

args.name: optionsSizeWidth
args.info: The width of the dialog either in pixels px or as a percentage.

args.name: optionsSizeHeight
args.info: The height of the dialog either in pixels px or as a percentage.

args.name: titleI18n
args.info: The optional localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: titleValue
args.info: The default text.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this dialog.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this glance.

args.name: targetOptions
args.info: JSON Object containing options which vary based on the type of target.

args.name: targetKey
args.info: The key of a dialog glance or web panel that should be opened in response to this action.

args.name: weight
args.info: Determines the order in which glances appear Glances are displayed top to bottom in order of ascending weight.

args.name: queryUrl
args.info: The URL of the resource providing the glance content.

args.name: iconUrl
args.info: Url for the icon.

args.name: iconUrl2x
args.info: Url for the retina version of the icon.

args.name: conditions
args.info: Array of JSON objects of conditions determine whether this glance is shown.

args.name: nameI18n
args.info: The optional localization key.

args.name: nameValue
args.info: The display name of the glance text.

args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this glance.

args.info: Localization key used to look up the localized value.

args.name: nameValue
args.info: The display name of the webPanel.

args.name: weight
args.info: Determines the order in which webPanel appear.

args.name: url
args.info: The URL of the resource providing the view content.

args.name: authentication
args.info: The authentication method for this webpanel. One of: jwt, none.

args.name: location
args.info: The location of this webPanel. One of: hipchat, sidebar, right.

args.name: conditions
args.info: Array of JSON objects of conditions determine whether this web panel is shown.

args.name: iconUrl
args.info: Url for the icon to display on the left side of the webPanel title.

args.name: iconUrl2x
args.info: Url for the retina version of the icon to display on the left side of the webPanel title.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this webhook.

args.name: name
args.info: The label for this webhook.

args.name: url
args.info: The URL to send the webhook POST to.

args.name: pattern
args.info: The regular expression pattern to match against messages.

args.name: authentication
args.info: The authentication method for this webhook. One of: jwt, none.

args.name: key
args.info: Unique key to identify this webhook.

args.name: event
args.info: The event to listen for. One of: room_archived, room_created, room_deleted, room_enter, room_exit, room_file_upload, room_message, room_notification, room_topic_change, room_unarchived.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: key

blocks.name: getIntegrationInstallableData
blocks.description: Get integration installable data This resource is only useful for integration installations that provide the integration with the installable data URL. Will be deleted after first access.

args.name: token
args.info: The one time use token for accessing installable information.

args.name: integrationIdOrKey
args.info: The id or key of the integration.

args.name: token
args.info: The allocated token of the link to be accessed.

blocks.name: deleteIntegrationLink
blocks.description: Delete a link endpoint by its token.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: token
args.info: The allocated token returned when the link was created.

blocks.name: createIntegrationLink
blocks.description: Create a link target through which an integration can be reached through HipChat. A token will be returned which is used to access the link.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: target
args.info: The address of the endpoint which will be invoked when the link is accessed.

args.name: ttl
args.info: The lifetime of the link token.

blocks.name: pushUIChangesToGroup
blocks.description: Push addon ui update to a group.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: glance
args.info: Array of JSON objects of glances to update.

blocks.name: pushUIChangesToRoom
blocks.description: Push addon ui update to a room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room to push the ui updates.

args.name: glance
args.info: Array of JSON objects of glances to update.

blocks.name: pushUIChangesToUserInRoom
blocks.description: Push addon ui update to a single user in a room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: userIdOrEmail
args.info: The id or email of the user to push the ui updates.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room to push the ui updates.

args.name: glance
args.info: Array of JSON objects of glances to update.

blocks.name: pushUIChangesToUser
blocks.description: Push addon ui update to a user.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: userIdOrName
args.info: The id or name of the user to push the ui updates.

args.name: glance
args.info: Array of JSON objects of glances to update.

blocks.name: inviteUserToGroup
blocks.description: Invites a user to join a group.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: title
args.info: The invited user's title.

args.name: email
args.info: Email to sent the invite to.

args.name: name
args.info: The invited user's full name.

blocks.name: getAutoJoinRooms
blocks.description: Get the list of rooms a user joins when they log in.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to retrieve rooms.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The start index for the result set.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of results. In range: 0-1000.

blocks.name: getAllUsers
blocks.description: List all users in the group.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The start index for the result set.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of results. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: includeGuests
args.info: Include active guest users in response.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include deleted users in response.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: name
args.info: User's full name.

args.name: roles
args.info: Array of Strings, of list, of roles for the user.

args.name: title
args.info: User's title.

args.name: mentionName
args.info: User's @mention name.

args.name: isGroupAdmin
args.info: Whether or not this user is an admin.

args.name: timezone
args.info: User's timezone Must be a supported timezone.

args.name: password
args.info: User's password.

args.name: email
args.info: User's email.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to view.

blocks.name: updateUser
blocks.description: Update a user. A guest cannot be updated.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id email address or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to update.

args.name: name
args.info: User's full name.

args.name: roles
args.info: Comma-separated list of roles for the user.

args.name: title
args.info: User's title.

args.name: presenceStatus
args.info: Presence status message of the user.

args.name: presenceShow
args.info: Presence status to show for the user.

args.name: mentionName
args.info: User's mention name.

args.name: isGroupAdmin
args.info: Whether or not this user is an admin.

args.name: timezone
args.info: User's timezone.

args.name: password
args.info: User's password.

args.name: email
args.info: User's email.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to delete.

blocks.name: getPrivatechatMessage
blocks.description: Fetch one specific message by id.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: messageId
args.info: The id of the message to retrieve.

args.name: idOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone. Must be a supported timezone.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

blocks.name: getPrivatechatHistory
blocks.description: Fetch chat history for the 1:1 chat with the user identified by id or email.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id or email of the user.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of messages to return. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: reverse
args.info: Reverse the output such that the oldest message is first.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The offset for the messages to return.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

args.name: date
args.info: Either the latest date to fetch history for in ISO-8601 format, or 'recent' to fetch the latest 75 messages.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone. Must be a supported timezone name, please see wikipedia TZ database page.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Either the earliest date to fetch history for in ISO-8601 format, or 'null' to disable this filter.

blocks.name: getRecentPrivatechatHistory
blocks.description: Fetch latest chat history for the 1:1 chat with the user identified by id or email.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id or email of the user.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of messages to return. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone. Must be a supported timezone.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

args.name: notBefore
args.info: The id of the message that is oldest in the set of messages to be returned.

blocks.name: sendPrivateMessage
blocks.description: Sends a user a private message. This API can only be called using a user token.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to send a message to.

args.name: message
args.info: The message body.

args.name: notify
args.info: Whether this message should trigger a user notification.

args.name: messageFormat
args.info: Determines how the message is treated by our server and rendered inside HipChat applications. One of: html, text.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: size
args.info: The size to retrieve. One of: small, big.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user.

blocks.name: updatePhoto
blocks.description: Update a user photo. A guest cannot be updated.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to update.

args.name: photo
args.info: The user photo as a base64 encoded string.

blocks.name: deletePhoto
blocks.description: Delete a user photo. A guest cannot be updated.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrEmail
args.info: The id, email address, or mention name (beginning with an @) of the user to update.

blocks.name: shareFileWithUser
blocks.description: Share a file with another user.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrName
args.info: The id or email of user to send the file to.

args.name: file
args.info: File to share.

args.name: message
args.info: The message.

blocks.name: shareLinkWithUser
blocks.description: Share a link with another user.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: idOrName
args.info: The id or email of user to send the link to.

args.name: message
args.info: The message.

args.name: link
args.info: An absolute link to share.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: name
args.info: Name of the room.

args.name: privacy
args.info: Whether the room is available for access by other users or not. One of: public, private.

args.name: isArchived
args.info: Whether the room should be archived or not.

args.name: isGuestAccessible
args.info: Whether or not to enable guest access for this room.

args.name: topic
args.info: The new topic for the room.

args.name: ownerId
args.info: User ID or email address of the room's owner.

args.name: delegateAdminVisibility
args.info: Whether the room is visible to delegate admins.

blocks.name: deleteRoom
blocks.description: Deletes a room and kicks the current participants.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

blocks.name: getAllRooms
blocks.description: List non archived rooms for this group.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The start index for the result set.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of results. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: includePrivate
args.info: Filter out private rooms.

args.name: includeArchived
args.info: Filter rooms.

args.name: ownerUserId

blocks.name: getRoomMessage
blocks.description: Fetch one specific message by id.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: messageId
args.info: The id of the message to retrieve.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone. Must be a supported timezone.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

blocks.name: getRoomHistory
blocks.description: Fetch chat history for this room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of messages to return. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: reverse
args.info: Reverse the output such that the oldest message is first.

args.name: startIndex
args.info: The offset for the messages to return.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

args.name: date
args.info: Either the latest date to fetch history for in ISO-8601 format.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Either the earliest date to fetch history for the ISO-8601 format.

blocks.name: getRecentRoomHistory
blocks.description: Fetch latest chat history for this room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: The maximum number of messages to return. In range: 0-1000.

args.name: timezone
args.info: Your timezone.

args.name: includeDeleted
args.info: Include records about deleted messages into results.

args.name: notBefore
args.info: The id of the message that is oldest in the set of messages to be returned.

blocks.name: sendRoomNotification
blocks.description: Send a message to a room.

args.name: authToken
args.info: API access token.

args.name: roomIdOrName
args.info: The id or url encoded name of the room.

args.name: from
args.info: A label to be shown in addition to the sender's name.

args.name: messageFormat
args.info: Determines how the message is treated by our server and rendered inside HipChat applications.

args.name: color
args.info: Background color for message. One of: yellow, green, red, purple, gray, random.

args.name: attachTo
args.info: The message id to to attach this notification to, for example if this notification is in response to a particular message.

args.name: notify
args.info: Whether this message should trigger a user notification.

args.name: message
args.info: The message body.

args.name: cardStyle
args.info: Type of the card. One of: file, image, application, link, media.

args.name: cardDescriptionValue
args.info: Card description in the specific format.

args.name: cardDescriptionFormat
args.info: Card description format that can be html or text.

args.name: cardFormat
args.info: Application cards can be compact 1 to 2 lines or medium 1 to 5 lines.

args.name: cardUrl
args.info: The url where the card will open.

args.name: cardTitle
args.info: Card title of the card.

args.name: cardThumbnailUrl
args.info: The thumbnail url.

args.name: cardThumbnailWidth
args.info: The original width of the image.

args.name: cardThumbnailUrl2x
args.info: The thumbnail url in retina.

args.name: cardThumbnailHeight
args.info: The original height of the image.

args.name: cardActivityHtml
args.info: Html for the activity to show in one line a summary of the action that happened.

args.name: cardActivityIconUrl
args.info: The url where the icon is.

args.name: cardActivityIconUrl2x
args.info: The url for the icon in retina.

args.name: cardAttributes
args.info: Array of JSON objects of list of attributes to show below the card.

args.name: cardId
args.info: An id that will help HipChat recognise the same card when it is sent multiple times.

args.name: cardIconUrl
args.info: The url where the card icon is.

args.name: cardIconUrl2x
args.info: The url for the card icon in retina.
